settings.question: What are your business hours?
settings.answer: We're available Monday through Friday, 9am to 6pm EST. For urgent inquiries, you can reach us via WhatsApp.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the US. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on location.

settings.question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer special pricing for salons and retailers. Please contact us with your business details for more information.
